body:
@sunahsuh Hi! This isn't something we're working on right now, unfortunately.

As a work-around you could probably use the `last_updated` field of a recipe. Recipes don't usually change after they are disabled, so if the recipe is disabled, `last_updated` is probably going to be the last time they were disabled as well. It may over estimate the time span, but at least it provides an upper bound.
